script:
"Why do programmers love coffee so much? ☕️  
Because it helps them Java-script through the day! 💻  
Without it, they're just de-bugging in slow motion. 🐛  
Coffee: turning code into mood since forever! 😄  
Hit like for more caffeine-fueled code jokes! ☕👍"
preview: A humorous take on programmers' coffee addiction
